for that our life one law is valid the
law of love which brings the highest
happiness to every of individual as well
as to all mankind free your minds from
these overgrown mountainous imbecilities
which hinder your recognition of it and
at once the truth will emerge from amid
the pseudo religious nonsense that has
been smothering it the indubitable
eternal truth inherent to man which is
one and the same and all the great
religions of the world it will in due
time emerge and make its way to general
recognition and the nonsense that has
obscured it will disappear of itself and
it will go the evil from which humanity
now suffers children look up words with
your be clouded eyes and a world full of
love and joy will disclose itself to you
a rational world made by my visions the
only world then you will know what love
is done with you what love is bestowed
upon you what love demands from you
Krishna Yash naina poliana December 14th
1908 this audio presentation of a letter
to a Hindu the subjection of India its
